name: YouTube Black - KMV
description:
Black YouTube Theme by KMV.

Text & Links customizable.
Note: Custom CSS requires uninstall of old version before updating.

Consider this theme "Clean".
Most colours are B/W until hovered.
Designed to be easy on the eyes - most distractions have been reduced to a minimum.
Works straight out of the box - no "Enable YouTube Dark Theme" again.

Note:
I do not have an YT account, so there are likely elements within user account-pages not covered.

Features custom cursors, -scrollbars, subtle opacities and gradients, hover transitions on Menus, Buttons, Logos and Popups.
Dark Theme on reCAPTCHA & YouTube Login page included.

All options in separate codes. Delete any of these to disable.

Main Player is untouched to accommodate for the many custom interfaces available.


Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact;
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community/p1

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

additional_info:
2019-08-27 Published

/*The rest of Update notes from 2019 are removed to not exceed character limit.*/

2020-01-01 Adjusted Zoom on Front Page
2020-01-02 Added a :hover to "More" Button on Results list
2020-01-04 Sorted code. Adjusted Button Hovers & added Dark Background on Disabled Chat
2020-01-12 Less colour and slight borders to buttons, hoverable borders to boxes and popups. Transparent black on previous grey sub-menus and video popups - black instead of grey on tool-tips. General toning down of bright elements. Index split into separate code for better overview.
2020-01-13 Added Dark to Transcript Header Bar.
2020-01-28 Added :hover to "more" in results-list and proper :hover over list items.
2020-01-31 Altered (white) background sometimes visible over videos.
2020-02-13 Added colour transition-delay to Embedded Channel-logo
2020-02-23 Added Dark to Redirect Page Background, and Buttons thereon.
2020-03-01 Added :hovers to text in "clarification" box.
2020-03-29 Fixed a couple of backgrounds + :hovers (Warning Plaque under videos + a couple more)
2020-04-09 #1 Updated reCAPTCHA (Includes new hCaptcha). #2 Added :hover transition to ads. Inverted white pre-load grids.
2020-04-10 Changed (new) White Thumbnail-Preview Background on Video Progress Bar:hover to Transparent Black.
2020-04-11 Removed pre-load-grids entirely
2020-04-13 Corrected Dropdown Highlighting (Selected)
2020-04-15 Added Scrollbar option in description
2020-04-18 Removed Video Player (Skeleton) Frame.
2020-04-22 Dark Scrollbar added.
2020-05-10 Changed Blue Button Borders to Gray, and removed a few unnecessary button:hovers. Added Background to Time Stamps on Video Player Hover-Preview. Tweaked ads and Video Likes/Dislikes.
2020-05-13 Added Dark to new Info-placards under videos and arrows on popups.
2020-05-19 Reduced visibility of Channel Thumb in video. Hover as usual.
2020-05-20 Fixed new Info Panel under videos
2020-06-17 Darkened Music Promotion on Front Page, inverted new Video Ad Overlay and reduced new enlarged thumb-size on Search Results Page.
2020-06-22 Added Dark to "Merch Shelf" Ads under videos and enabled White Arrows on Custom Scrollbars
2020-07-15 Updated reCAPTCHA and rounded a couple of square button-hovers.
2020-07-18 Cursor auto-hide integrated
2020-07-20 Updated cursors. Future updates will follow. Scrollbar has been forced ("!important") to make up for Custom Scrollbar on other pages.
2020-07-21 Changed Colour of Playlist Thumbnail- & Top Loading Bar
2020-07-23 Updated description
2020-08-05 Darkened the new Menu Bar, and fixed some transparency issues on Top Bar/Header that came along with this recent update. Thumbnails have begotten "brightness" instead of "opacity" for a better look. A few main square buttons are now #111 instead of #222.
2020-08-11 Long awaited Interactive Update. Mostly "invisible features", but a lot of tweaking under the hood. Buttons and menu hovers respond more quickly, and the last few features have been added. New Pointers have been appointed. Most interactive elements have been tweaked. Playlist is also revamped. Links and menu's now react to clicks also.
2020-08-13 reCAPTCHA background bled over to embedded video backgrounds > now corrected. Changed text-selection colours slightly, and made setting "!important" -both to stick across browsers.
2020-08-14 Improved in-video Suggestions hover.
2020-08-21 Added dim-effects to merchandise slots under videos
2020-08-29 Added hovers on suggestion-titles at the end of embedded videos.
2020-09-03 Added Dark to a new area on Consent Window. Added slight hovers on buttons.
2020-09-04 Inverted a Log-In image (Keyhole w/ white background)
2020-09-11 Removed new Consent Prompt.
2020-09-13 Re-enabled Consent prompt, as it paused auto-playing videos. Corrected Playlist Overview Hover and added hovers on Channel Subscriptions.
2020-09-18 Removed "google.com" from the main css, as code interfered with too many elements. Most google-users here surely already have a theme there. Fixed "Language" & "Location" on-click in dropdown menu.
2020-09-22 Added hovers to "Latest YouTube posts" on front page, and removed a Gray BG on scrollable shelf on the same.
2020-09-30 Corrected hover and click on Show/Hide Chat Button. Added dark background to secondary scrollbars (in windows) & black pointer to new item-hover on front page.
2020-10-02 Darkened Consent Background on Chrome based browser to avoid white blinking when loading it's content. Author avatar under video made B/W w/hoverable colour.
2020-10-07 Added Dark BG to new Notification Header on top of search results ("controversial content"...) and corrected "Play All" button hovers on Playlist overview. Added Black Pointer to new popup elements at the end of videos.
2020-10-10 Added Dark BG, Pointers and hovers to new Donation Notification.
2020-10-18 Removed a brightness setting disabling video output on embedded (iframe) and fullscreen videos on Chrome. Removed pointer on fullscreen on the same (autohide reinstated on Chrome - Not sure if a recent YT update, or overlooked on my part).
2020-11-06 Added Dark to Overlay Buttons.
2020-11-23 Added pointer. Tweaked new Top Bar.
2020-11-29 Restored Dark to Tor Error page.
2020-12-09 Simple update to Announcements on Front Page.
2020-12-21 Updated Popup Notification for new embedded Autoplay Button, added borders to Chat & tweaked most dimming hovers. Text & Links are now Customizable.
2021-03-09 B/W to new YT Logo on Top Bar. Updated Black Mouse Pointer on Info Field under selected videos. Tweaked new "Cancel" & "Up Next" buttons at the end of videos.
2021-03-18 Added Dark to new Dropdown elements, Chat pinned comment, and Tooltip. Pointers updated.
2021-03-25 Fixed false hovers on new Vote Buttons Bar
2021-04-06 Included elements on new Consent page.
2021-04-08 Tweaked all elements on Consent Page to B/W. Fixed Voting Area in comment section and re-added link-hover on Suggested Video Titles at the end of videos to accommodate the latest YT update.
2021-04-10 Update to new Dropdown element Hover in Channel Sort List. Added "Click-function" to  buttons on Consent page. Fixed a semi-transparent background on Search Bar Tooltip. Fixed new Channel Tabs and re-integrated Video Lists Hover- & On-click Brightness.
2021-04-12 More elements discovered: Video Lists under videos now have proper Hover and On-Click function again. New Popups have been reinstated with Dark Background on Hover. Selected Advertisements and Notifications with White Background are now Black. Fixed hover on Left Side Slide Menu Options. Main Left hand side Highlighted Icons are now Brighter. Main BG under "Discover" is corrected to Black instead of Grey.
2021-04-15 Updating to Update continuing: Re-added Dark to Chat Show/Hide Button, and removed new Blue Border around main buttons. Dark BG to new Propaganda on Front Page and Gradient Button in "Explore" section.
2021-07-03 Added missing backgrounds.
2021-07-15 Added Dark Backgrounds to Language Selector on YT Consent page.
2021-07-16 Reinstated Highlight Colour (currently playing) on new Playlist element.
2021-09-08 Tweaked Voice Search Button on Top Bar.
2021-10-08 Dark to new Consent Background.
